website_summaries.verdict: The Hestan Cue is a good way to elevate your cooking skills. Unfortunately, it costs too much for the average foodie.
pros: The $650 Hestan Cue uses Bluetooth to connect a pan, a countertop induction burner and an app to walk you through recipes and regulate your cooking temperature
Each step comes with videos that show you what to do
The app's recipes are delicious and make it easy to improve your cooking skills
cons: For $650, you only get a pan and a burner
There also isn't any room in the app to customize recipes or add your own
And it had problems delivering even cooking results with thick, uneven cuts of meat

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I made my first meal with this system yesterday and was so happy with the results. It turned out awesome! I can't believe how fast the pan pre-heats and maintains high temperatures. I've never seen a pan heat up so fast before. It's so easy to clean too. You just bring it right over to the sink when you're done cooking, wipe with soapy water, rinse, and dry. I love this so much, I immediately went out and bought the Chef's Pot this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Mcclary

customer_reviews.title: What a fun system to use
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to use. The app that drives this smart appliance is idiot proof. The build quality is first rate and the app is easy to follow, uncluttered, and professional. I have done the seared salmon and made caramelized onions so far and both were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Messick

customer_reviews.title: Only received burner, no fry pan in box
customer_reviews.text: Still haven't heard from the seller on why I didn't receive the fry pan in my box. The system doesn't work with the app at all unless you have both the induction burner and the fry pan.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, easy to use and accurate temp.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE S MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Beginner to Professional must have it
customer_reviews.text: The best smart cooking pan I’ve ever used. Recommend to everyone from beginner to professional.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I am a French chef and with the situation today I became a private chef. It’s a gadget, it works well but still a gadget the price is really not what I will pay for. You can find way better for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Julian D

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use with the app. Surprisingly easy to clean. Works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McElliott

customer_reviews.title: A genius product
customer_reviews.text: This hot plate is beyond anything we could have imagined. We bought this for our office and have been very pleased with how quickly it heats up and keeps an even temperature with no hot spots. It is easy to clean and is a good size for the countertop. I polled all who are using it and everyone said it was a wonderful product, easy to use and maintain. If you are looking for a cooking surface that is a power house, this is the gadget for you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Makes anyone a professional chef
customer_reviews.text: The Cue app walks you through everything from preparing the food to cooking the food, step by step... it knows exactly what temp it is at and gets it to the hottest temps within seconds. First time using induction and now I know why people love it so much. You can use it as a regular induction top or use the recipes to make dishes that you would never make on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to use and great for teaching other family members how to cook. It simply guides you through chef developed recipes allowing you to create dishes you may not otherwise try.
customer_reviews.author: cabin bound

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful system, really makes cooking a pleasure. Food comes out great.
customer_reviews.author: MarkPogue

customer_reviews.title: i’m extremely disappointed by the number of receipes
customer_reviews.text: i’m extremely disappointed by the number of receipes. The ads say hundreds, but in reality there are maybe 40. Most are duplicates. Would never have bought this stupid thing had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional cook and was introduced to the Hestan Cue through a friend of mine. When the opportunity arose for me to actually cook With it, I was amazed by the consistency the unit produced. I was led through each step of the recipe via the app. The food that I made looked EXACTLY like the food in the app. I recommend this product for food enthusiasts and the budding chef!
customer_reviews.author: Hubert Tsai

customer_reviews.title: I didn't burn the crepes!
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely blown away from the first time I used my Cue. The first thing I cooked was the crepe and simply said, I didn’t burn the first one. I’ve cooked crepes before, and without a doubt the first was always burnt. But the app flow that it walks you through is clear, simple and fun. I would suggest this to anyone looking to gain confidence in the kitchen. It takes the hardest part out of the equation, time and temp
customer_reviews.author: conner

customer_reviews.title: Way off the future
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It is the way off the future. It makes making complicated dishes very easy. Basically you can cook restaurant quality food for fraction of the cost. You can also determine how much oil and salt you are going to use, so it is also a much healthier alternative compared to going to a restaurant. Additionally, entertaining and hosting friends and family is also very rewarding with Hestan Smart Cooking. Finally, safety; it prevents you from forgetting food on the burner.
customer_reviews.author: Joshan

customer_reviews.title: Simply excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We received the Cue and I cooked with the Cue beef and broccoli, shrimp, Salmon, asparagas and bananas foster. I would never be cooking most of these meals without your system, and we impressed friends with the Banana’s Foster Saturday evening, they said they will be getting the Cue! I have cooked at least 20 different meals and sauces so far, we are foodies and absolutely love the flavors and quality of the food produced, simply excellent! My wife just ordered the Hestan Pot and I am looking forward to the many recipes I can cook with it!
customer_reviews.author: cmcpc

customer_reviews.title: This has completely replaced my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cue induction cooktop and pan about a year ago. I started trying to make the salmon. It was the best I'd ever had. The app perfectly controls the time and temperature of the pan and then guides you every step of the way to create a perfect meal. I've been able to cook dishes I would never have thought possible. I ended up upgrading to the sauce pot which I love for making risotto. The money we have saved on take out has easily paid for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get into induction cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is clearly a product that has been well-thought and engineered with a Silicon Valley-type mindset. Opening the box reminds one of opening an Apple laptop box. The items are built like a tank. They look so cool on the kitchen counter, too. The app is very easy and intuitive. We have only just begun to discover everything this offers, but this is a great way to get into induction cooking.
customer_reviews.author: TINETQL

customer_reviews.title: I don't cook at home a lot but I was super psyched to use this
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLY impressed. As a professional chef with Michelin experience, I don't cook at home a lot but I was super psyched to use this. Takes the guess work out of the process, and as a skeptic with new kitchen equipment the Cue definitely did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: j.khanna

customer_reviews.title: Great new system of cooking for even amateur cooks
customer_reviews.text: Great new system of cooking for even amateur cooks. After setting up the app and finding the recipe you want, it's quite easy to follow. If everything is done according to the app plan, your meal comes out perfectly each time. A great way to finally get perfectly cooked meals with some nice healthy options for meals. The induction stove and the pan itself are also really made with some great quality and thought. Easy to keep clean and portable to anywhere you'd like to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Fathom

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for an "older cook"!
customer_reviews.text: I received the Hestan Cue as a gift this summer and I was concerned about whether I would be able to follow the instructions and recipes.....not an issue!! I made several recipes , all exceeding my expectations and tasted wonderful. My favorite recipe is the Shrimp Tikka Masala....as my husband and I love Indian food. The chicken cacciatore is another favorite. This product delivers on it's promise that its recipes come out just right! I recommend the Hestan Cue for beginners in the kitchen and for "older" cooks .....because you are never to old to adapt to a new cooking experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Levick

customer_reviews.title: Great content, tasty recipes
customer_reviews.text: The cue is a very relaxing tool for me to use in the kitchen. I enjoy using the control mode so I can multitask. However, there are a ton of chef inspired recipes to choose from and the ones that I have tried have turned out very tasty! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: shawna plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: It is a hot plate. That is all. No way near worth $500.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gilligan????
customer_reviews.text: why dont i just learn how to cook using proper technique, ingredients and correct equipment ???
customer_reviews.author: Brent J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Cooking
customer_reviews.text: It's an OK pan, even if it's not nonstick, but for one pan and a burner and an app the price is pretty steep. You could get a whole set of good cookware for that.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Fraser

product_meta.title: Hestan Cue Smart Cooking System Countertop Induction Burner Cooktop + 11" Smart Fry Pan - 2-Piece Smart (App based - Control Mode) Home Portable Electric Stove and Induction Fry Pan (Gen 1)
product_meta.description:
Material Type:Stainless Steel| Size:Gen 1

Trusted by Williams-Sonoma for smart home appliances, the Hestan Cue mini induction cooktop, smart induction frying pan and Hestan Cue Recipe App bring your cooking skills to a new level. Our connected cooking experience provides video-guided cooking that automatically controls temperatures on our small induction saucepan and burner and time, every step of every recipe. Hestan Cue’s smart cookware, induction burner and recipe app all communicate with each other using Bluetooth technology and embedded sensors - automatically adjusting the cooking temperature and time as you proceed through each recipe. Hestan Cue’s Smart Home Cooking is your kitchen coach, walking you through each recipe step with video guidance. Try new dishes. Learn new skills. Elevate your cooking without fear of overcooking or underwhelming. Cue doesn't cook for you - It helps you cook better food, more often. On the go? Use Hestan Cue’s portable induction burner for cooking while traveling. Our travel induction stovetop includes a smart induction cooktop and pan for all your cooking needs.

This kit includes:
1x Smart Compact Induction Burner
1x 11” Smart Fry Pan
Full access to the Hestan Cue Recipe App
feature_bullets: Hestan Cue is the perfect addition to your smart home devices. Built with your smart kitchen in mind, our Smart Cooking System includes 11" Smart Fry Pan, Smart Induction Burner, and full access to the Hestan Cue Recipe App. Make the move to Hestan Cue for your smart induction cooktop needs today

Trusted by Williams-Sonoma for home small appliances, you can learn how to cook better no matter your skill level. Use the Hestan Cue electric burner (portable) in the comfort of your home and deliver remarkable results every time.

Hestan Cue’s smart induction frying pan and smart induction burner cookware automatically adjust your cooking temperatures as you're guided through recipes with step-by-step videos from professional chefs

Want more smart kitchen appliances? Think Hestan Cue. Our smart home kitchen system includes a single induction burner to replace your outdated electric kitchen stove, small induction frying pan, and a recipe app that continuously communicate with each other using induction cooktop Bluetooth technology and embedded temperature sensors

Use our smart burner for cooking at home or take the Hestan Cue induction cooktop for travel and on-the go cooking. Our smart single burner electric stove, mini induction pan and Hestan Cue Recipe App make cooking a breeze. Includes induction cooktop with cookware.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars55 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
